content.rendered:
• Dual-Pump System
  • Real Time Mean Arterial Pressure Monitoring
  • Dynamic Setting Regulation (DSR)
  • Minimal Stress Technology
  • Maximum cutting rate 20,000 cuts/min
  • Integrated laser module 532mm
  • Three independent high efficiency LED light sources
